name: custom/about-area
title: About Area
description: A custom block for the about area with tabs.

description.default: Following the same idea behind Open Source Software, an Open Source AI is a system made available under terms that grant users the freedoms to:

default.label: Use
default.content: Use the system for any purpose and without having to ask for permission.

default.label: Study
default.content: Study how the system works and understand how its results were created.

default.label: Modify
default.content: Modify the system for any purpose, including to change its output.

default.label: Share
default.content: Share the system for others to use with or without modifications, for any purpose.
